Name: Science Facility
Description:
Contains upgrades for all Umojan Units.

Enables:
- Energy Generator from Supply Cache
- Advanced units at all nearby production facilities

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Cancels construction of this structure, destroying the structure and giving a partial refund.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 3

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 2

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Power Overcharge 1

Root.Tooltip:
Normal Power Level: Normal operation speed, no shield.
Power Overcharge 1: Operate +5% faster. 25% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 2: Operate +10% faster. 50% of max HP as max shield.
Power Overcharge 3: Operate +15% faster. 100% of max HP as max shield.
Root.Name: Normal Power Level

Root.Tooltip: Selects the unit constructing this structure.
Root.Name: Select Builder

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Starships Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Starship

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Starships Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Starship

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Infantries Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Infantry

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Infantries Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Infantry

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Vehicles Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Vehicle

Root.Tooltip: Specialize this Science Facility in Vehicles Researches.
Root.Name: Specialize in Vehicle

Root.Tooltip: **Preatorians** gain +10 life and +10 shield.
Root.Name: Research Combat Shield

Root.Tooltip: Permanently cloak **Mists** and **Howlers** and make **Crows** cloak nearby allies. Cloak renders the unit invisible to enemies unless the unit is revealed by detectors or effects.
Root.Name: Research Cloaking Field

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Battlecat** to teleport to a nearby target location.
Root.Name: Research Blink

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Preatorians** to channel theirs shields into theirs weapons.
Root.Name: Research Power to the Weapon

Root.Tooltip: Increases the movement speed of **Mists** and **Howlers**.
Root.Name: Research High Output Thruster

Root.Tooltip: Allow **Battlecats** to interface with a rider, granting them a bonus.**Preatorian**'s Power To The Weapon grant to the **Battlecat** a 0.5 speed boost.**Plasmabat**'s Corrosive Blast is applied against the primary target of the **Battlecat**'s attacks.**Shadowguard**'s Cloak is applied to the **Battlecat**.
Root.Name: Research Battlelink System

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Plasmabat** to fire 2 additional Corrosive Blast before needing to reload. All charges are refueled at the same time.
Root.Name: Research Plasma Recycler

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Howlers** to fire a Missile Barrage at either ground or air targets.
Root.Name: Research Overload Weapons

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Norns** to build **Sentry Guns**, **Energy Barricades** and to repair mechanical allies 300% faster.
Root.Name: Research Engineering Suit

Root.Tooltip: Allows **Harmonisers** to use Disruption Web. Ground units and structures under the Disruption Web cannot attack. Last 15 seconds.
Root.Name: Research Disruption Web

Root.Tooltip: Increases the starting energy of **Crow** by 25.
Root.Name: Research Corvid Reactor

Root.Tooltip: Upgrades the shields of all Umojan units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 1

Root.Tooltip: Further upgrades the shields of all Umojan units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 2

Root.Tooltip: Maximizes the shields of all Umojan units and structures.
Root.Name: Upgrade Shields Level 3

Root.Tooltip: Equip the **Command Hub** with external generators, making it produce a Power Level in an area and an additional level for itself.
Root.Name: Research Overcharge Generator
